channel.title: Meetingnotes on HKU Student Union
channel.description: Recent content in Meetingnotes on HKU Student Union

item.title: Meeting Notes September 25 2025
item.description: Discussed a lot about the upcoming big rollout and a new event

item.title: Meeting Notes September 18 2025
item.description: Discussed a lot of things with VIDIUS

item.title: Meeting Notes September 11 2025
item.description: The First meeting of the school year, to discuss some of our goals and what the next steps are for the Union

item.title: Meeting Notes June 14
item.description: Meeting notes of June 14 2025, mainly about the action of June 17

item.title: Meeting Notes June 5 2025
item.description: About the action to hand over our bundle of thoughts to the CvB and moving it to the 17th, a new edition of the newsletter and an ant end party at the end of the school year.

item.title: Meeting Notes May 29 2025
item.description: About the workshop policy and a follow-up email to the CvB, planning an action for the workshops, discussed next school year and how to introduce the new first years to the Union,
